optionresponse.label: What is the boiling temperature of water in Celcius?
optionresponse.description: You can convert Fahrenheit to Celcius with the following forumula: \(C = (F-32)*5/9\).

optioninput.option: 32° 3232° is the temperature at which water freezes in Fahrenheit
212° 212° is the termperature at which water boils in Fahrenheit
451° Paper is reported to auto ignite at 451° Fahrenheit

div.p: Temperatures in Celcius are much more logical than Fahrenheit temperatures. Water freezes at 0° and boils at 100°.

demandhint.hint: 212° is the correct temperature, as specified in Fahrenheit
32° is too cold using either methods of specification
